A chubby man named Sota, reminiscent of 'Kuma no Puu-san', is drawing illustrations for a picture book at his desk.
A trophy from a prestigious award is displayed on a bookshelf.
Sota, in an apron, is diligently preparing a traditional Japanese breakfast with rice and miso soup.
A neatly arranged breakfast for two on the dining table.
The clock shows 7:30 AM.
A woman with tousled hair is sleeping in a double bed, while Sota stands beside the bed.
Sota loudly announces, 'Kaede-san, breakfast is ready!'
Kaede, with sleepy eyes, glares at Sota.
Sota apologizes, 'Ah, sorry.'
Kaede, with a changed expression, says she couldn't sleep until dawn.
Kaede, looking displeased, extends her hands.
Sota, sweating, responds, 'Ah, yes...'
Kaede is slender with a model-like figure, though not tall, shorter than Sota.
Sota hugs Kaede to help her stand up.
Sota and Kaede are eating breakfast together.
Kaede stops eating, looking at a yogurt and banana dessert.
Kaede asks, 'Sota-kun, what is this?'
Kaede, with a stern look, reminds Sota of her preference for yogurt with linseed.
Kaede continues to scold Sota.
Sota listens silently, feeling apologetic.
Kaede criticizes Sota for relying on internet information.
Sota promises to be more careful next time.
Sota, smiling wryly, listens to Kaede's critique.
That night, Sota brushes his teeth in pajamas.
Kaede, fresh from the bath, enters the living room in a bathrobe with a serious expression.
Kaede tells Sota she has something to discuss.
Sota responds, 'Hmm?'
Kaede announces she will leave the house tomorrow.
Sota is shocked and speechless.
Sota is confused and asks, 'Leave the house!?'
Kaede says she will stay at a friend's house from tomorrow.
Kaede quickly heads to the bedroom.
Sota is in a panic.
Sota wonders if this means separation, even though it's only been 10 days since their wedding.
